def minimum(a, x):
    return min(a % x, -a % x)

def minimum(a, x):
    return min(x-a%x, a%x)

def minimum(a, x):
    return abs(a - x*round(a/x))

def minimum(a, x):
    return min(a%x, abs(x - a%x))

def minimum(a, x):
    near=x
    while near<a:
        near += x
    plus = near-a
    minus = a-(near-x)
    return plus if plus < minus else minus

def minimum(a, b):
    return min(a % b, b - a % b)

def minimum(a, x):
    return min(a%x, x-a%x)
